title: PIA allowed to resume its flights operation for Toronto
content:
ISLAMABAD, June 22 (APP): Pakistan International Airlines (PIA) has announced the resumption of its direct flight operation to Toronto, Canada.
A PIA spokesman, in a statement , said the Canadian authorities had given permission to the PIA to restart its flights to Toronto.
Earlier, flight operation was stopped due to the increase in cases of corona virus, operations were restricted to the delivery of goods from Pakistan to Canada only.
Reported By Shabbir Hussain
APP, Digital News Service.
